solutions_page.intro_text: AmanVision deploys the power of AI to secure environments where human presence is no longer enough. From the privacy of a nursing home to the bustle of a station, we watch over every fall.
solutions_page.smart_gare_desc: In public buildings (ERP), a fall can lead to serious injuries and panic movements. AmanVision detects incidents in critical areas:
solutions_page.tech_stack_desc: AmanVision relies on world leaders in hardware to ensure stable and secure computing power.
solutions_page.rigueur_feat1_desc: Instant extraction of key body points to identify biomechanical anomalies.
solutions_page.rigueur_feat2_desc: Processing of shapes and patterns without capturing visual identity, GDPR compliant by design.
solutions_page.rigueur_feat3_desc: Feeds analyzed in RAM and immediately purged after detection for maximum security.
solutions_page.infra_subtitle: A robust architecture capable of processing hundreds of cameras simultaneously with near-zero latency.
